programme.title: Cold Moon
programme.desc: Crime and drama. The granddaughter of Clark’s character is murdered by a mysterious assailant, her body sunk into the black waters of the Styx River- where her parents disappeared from their boat a decade earlier. Suspicion falls on a duplicitous banker and his father

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: Action thriller with Val Kilmer as a spy and master of disguise, who is hired to steal a secret scientific formula for a Russian leader, only to fall in love with the professor who invented it (Elisabeth Shue)

programme.title: SuperBob
programme.desc: Action comedy, Brett Goldstein, Catherine Tate, Natalia Tena. Robert Kenner, a mild mannered postman from London was struck by a meteor which bestowed him with super powers. Today, Bob is an overworked under-appreciated civil servant who has his first date in six years

programme.title: Cold Moon

programme.title: The Fast And The Fierce
programme.desc: Action. When terrorists plant a bomb on a commercial flight, the passengers must fight to keep the plane in the air and everyone alive. If they let the plane dip below 800 feet, the bomb will go off and kill everyone

programme.title: Clockstoppers
programme.desc: A teenager discovers a mysterious machine that allows him to freeze time. Now he is using his new found device to get a few things for himself

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: A hapless chauffeur is transformed into a secret agent when he tries on a special tuxedo that gives special abilities to whoever is wearing it. High-octane action with Jackie Chan and Jennifer Love Hewitt

programme.title: The Admiral: Roaring Currents
programme.desc: Action drama which follows the famous 1597 Battle of Myeongryang during the Japanese invasion of Korea, where the iconic Joseon admiral Yi Sun-sin managed to destroy a total of 133 Japanese warships with only 13 ships remaining in his command

programme.title: Security
programme.desc: Crime drama. Antonio Banderas, Ben Kingsley. A mall security guard has to protect a female witness from a gang after they lose all forms of communication during a storm

programme.desc: Action. The U.S. government creates a reality TV show in which real world spies compete in undercover missions around the world. Sean Astin stars

programme.title: The Wolverine
programme.desc: Action. In this stand-alone spin-off, Wolverine (Hugh Jackman) is summoned to Japan at the behest of the dying Yashida, head of Japan's largest, most powerful tech giant, who implores Wolverine to protect his granddaughter whom he has chosen to take over the business

programme.title: Vengeance: A Love Story
programme.desc: Action and Thriller starring Nicolas Cage and Anna Hutchison. A Gulf War veteran seeks vengeance against those who assaulted a single mother

programme.title: S.W.A.T.: Under Siege
programme.desc: Action starring Michael Jai White. A SWAT compound comes under fire from an international terrorist who relentlessly and violently pursues a mystery man who was apprehended by Seattle SWAT after a raid went horribly wrong

programme.title: The Mod Squad
programme.desc: Action thriller. Three minor delinquints (Claire Danes, Giovanni Ribisi and Omar Epps) are recruited by Capt. Adam Greer (Dennis Farina) working undercover to bust a cop-drug ring. When Greer is killed, they go above and beyond the call of duty to solve the murder

programme.title: Beyond The Edge
programme.desc: Action and adventure starring Lyubov Aksyonova and Antonio Banderas. Contemporary Moscow. A talented gambler gathers a team of people with supernatural powers to win big at a casino. But they find a much stronger mystical rival

programme.title: The Hunt For Red October
programme.desc: Cold war thriller, Sean Connery, Alec Baldwin. A Soviet nuclear missile sub that is being tracked by an American submarine suddenly goes silent and "disappears". When it is determined that the silent Soviet Boomer may be headed for American coastal waters panic ensues

programme.title: Surrogates
programme.desc: Sci-fi action with Bruce Willis. In a futuristic world where humans live in isolation and interact through surrogate robots an FBI agent is forced to venture into the outside world to catch the inventor's killer

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Action comedy. Two Miami cops (Martin Lawrence, Will Smith) watch as $100 million in heroin is stolen from station headquarters, putting them hot on the trail of a French drug lord who leaves a trail of bodies in his wake and only one witness - in need of protection

programme.desc: Thriller starring Gary Oldman, Lena Olin and Annabella Sciorra. A corrupt cop who betrays mob witnesses bites off more than he can chew when he attempts to assassinate a beautiful but ruthless Russian-born hit woman

programme.title: Django
programme.desc: Drama. Romani jazz musician Django Reinhardt (Reda Kateb) manages to survive in Nazi-occupied France due to his fame as a performer. However, he faces a difficult choice when he's asked to participate in Germany's propaganda efforts

programme.title: Jack
programme.desc: Comedy drama with Robin Williams as a 10-year-old boy who has a unique aging disorder, making him look 40. Attending school his classmates tease him mercilessly until they realise the advantages of having him around

programme.title: Water For Elephants
programme.desc: Romantic drama with Reese Witherspoon and Robert Pattinson. A veterinary student falls for a married circus performer. Theirs is a love that could span lifetimes but the wrath of her husband threatens tragedy for all

programme.title: A United Kingdom
programme.desc: An inspiring true story, set in the 1940s, of Prince Seretse Khama of Botswana (David Oyelowo) and how his loving but controversial marriage to a British white woman, Ruth Williams (Rosamund Pike), put his kingdom into political and diplomatic turmoil

programme.title: Once Upon A Crime
programme.desc: Comedy. A woman (Cybill Shepherd) and an unemployed actor (John Candy) head to Monte Carlo to return a lost dachshund to its owner and collect a $5000 reward - but the dog's owner is murdered, and through a series of twists, the pair become prime suspects in the crime

programme.title: Out Of Africa
programme.desc: Romantic drama directed by Sydney Pollack starring Robert Redford and Meryl Streep. A Denmark native shares a marriage of convenience with a womanising baron. But when they move to Nairobi, she falls for a free-spirited hunter

programme.title: LA LA Land
programme.desc: Musical with Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone. An aspiring actress and a jazz musician, scraping by playing cocktail party gigs in dingy bars, are faced with decisions as success mounts that begin to fray the fragile fabric of their love affair

programme.title: Accepted
programme.desc: When a high school student is rejected by eight colleges, he starts his own university. Comedy starring Justin Long and Blake Lively

programme.title: Wild Hogs
programme.desc: A bored suburban husband convinces some of his pals to form a motorcycle gang. However, their masculine posturing is challenged when they cross a real gang called the Del Fuegos. Comedy with Tim Allen and John Travolta

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Based on the 80's TV action/drama, this movie focuses on vice detectives Crockett and Tubbs as their respective personal and professional lives become dangerously intertwined. Action with Colin Farrell and Jamie Foxx

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Based on the 80's TV action/drama, this movie focuses on vice detectives Crockett and Tubbs as their respective personal and professional lives become dangerously intertwined. Action with Colin Farrell and Jamie Foxx

programme.title: Aliens
programme.desc: Sci-fi action, Sigourney Weaver, Michael Biehn, Lance Henriksen. When contact is lost with the settlers who colonised the planet where her crew discovered the alien life form some fifty years earlier, sole survivor Ripley and a troop of marines are sent to investigate

programme.title: Once Upon A Crime

programme.title: LA LA Land

programme.title: Winter People
programme.desc: Drama. Set in the Appalachians during the Depression, lonely widower Wayland Jackson (Kurt Russell) falls in love with Collie Wright (Kelly McGillis) and becomes involved in a family feud that is sparked by the existence of Collie's illegitimate son

programme.title: The Christmas Dragon
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure. Ayden, a young girl in Medieval Europe, is the only person who can save Christmas after a dying elf gives her a magic crystal. Ayden and other orphans must escape fantasy creatures to bring enchantment back to the North

programme.title: A Monster Calls
programme.desc: Drama, Sigourney Weaver, Felicity Jones. A boy attempts to deal with his mother's illness and the bullying of his classmates by escaping to a fantastical world

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: A FedEx executive must transform himself physically and emotionally to survive a crash landing on a deserted island. Adventure with Tom Hanks and Paul Sanchez

programme.title: Julie And Julia
programme.desc: Comedy drama starring Meryl Streep and Amy Adams. Julia Child's story of her start in the cooking profession is intertwined with blogger Julie Powell's 2002 challenge to cook all the recipes in Child's first book

programme.title: Twilight
programme.desc: Fantasy drama starring Kristen Stewart and Robert Pattinson. When Bella Swan moves in with her father in the perpetually overcast town of Forks, Washington, she starts school and meets Edward Cullen, a mysterious classmate with a breath-taking secret

programme.title: Desperado
programme.desc: Action with Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek and Quentin Tarantino. The Mariachi takes on his entire army of henchmen in a dusty border town as an act of revenge for the murder of his love and his injured musician's hand

programme.desc: Action with Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek and Quentin Tarantino. The Mariachi takes on his entire army of henchmen in a dusty border town as an act of revenge for the murder of his love and his injured musician's hand

programme.title: Billy Bathgate
programme.desc: Crime drama starring Dustin Hoffman, Nicole Kidman, Loren Dean. A street-smart kid inveigles his way into the confidence of a 1930s gangster but is forced time again to rely on his wits to escape being sent to the bottom of the briny in a cement overcoat

programme.desc: A FedEx executive must transform himself physically and emotionally to survive a crash landing on a deserted island. Adventure with Tom Hanks and Paul Sanchez

programme.desc: Comedy drama starring Meryl Streep and Amy Adams. Julia Child's story of her start in the cooking profession is intertwined with blogger Julie Powell's 2002 challenge to cook all the recipes in Child's first book

programme.title: Gung Ho
programme.desc: The workers in an American car plant have to decide between redundancy or being bought out by a Japanese firm that wants to impose some very strange new working practices. Comedy with Michael Keaton and George Wendt

programme.title: True Heart
programme.desc: Two city kids, Sam (Zachery Ty Bryan) and sister Bonnie (Kirsten Dunst), gain a new perspective on life when they're lost in rugged Northwestern Canada and must rely on the help of a native and his bear in this adventure for the family

programme.title: Despicable Me 3
programme.desc: Animation. Gru (voice of Steve Carell) teams up with his long-lost twin brother, aspiring supervillain Dru (also Carell), to take down his most difficult opponent yet...a former 1980s child star-turned-bad guy named Balthazar Bratt

programme.title: War Horse
programme.desc: WWI drama detailing the remarkable bond between a man named Albert (Jeremy Irvine) and his loyal horse Joey, and the incredible journey Albert takes across Europe when the pair are forcibly separated as the war rages on

programme.title: Percy Jackson: Sea Of Monsters
programme.desc: Adventure. This follow-up finds Percy and Annabeth racing out to the Bermuda Triangle in search of the Golden Fleece. In their quest to confront the ultimate evil, Percy and friends battle swarms of mythical creatures with powers far beyond human comprehension

programme.title: Made Of Honor
programme.desc: Romantic comedy with Patrick Dempsey and Michelle Monaghan. Tom loves his life, until he realizes he also loves his best friend Hannah. When she gets engaged and asks Tom to be her maid of honor, he attempts to create the perfect wedding...and steal the bride

programme.title: Lost In The Cloud
programme.desc: Comedy. A couple (Cameron Diaz, Jason Segel) put some spice back into their marriage by recording a lovemaking session for posterity. Unfortunately it goes viral, sending the couple are on a madcap mission to save their reputations and avoid some serious embarrassment

programme.title: Lost In The Cloud
programme.desc: Comedy. A couple (Cameron Diaz, Jason Segel) put some spice back into their marriage by recording a lovemaking session for posterity. Unfortunately it goes viral, sending the couple are on a madcap mission to save their reputations and avoid some serious embarrassment

programme.title: All Eyez On Me
programme.desc: Drama. The true and untold story of prolific rapper, actor, poet and activist Tupac Shakur (Demetrius Shipp Jr.), from his early days in New York to his status as one of the world's most recognised and influential voices

programme.title: Kicks
programme.desc: Adventure. Fifteen-year-old Brandon longs for a pair of the freshest Air Jordans, assuming that wearing them will help him escape his reality. Working hard to get them, they are promptly snatched. Brandon goes on a dangerous mission to retrieve his stolen sneakers

programme.title: Beautiful Beast
programme.desc: Romance. A twist on the classic Beauty and the Beast tale. When Isabelle, a beauty only on the outside, becomes lost in the wilderness, she stumbles upon Jeremy, a man hiding from his past. Will Isabelle revert to the beast and give up her chance at real love?

programme.title: RV
programme.desc: An overworked executive Bob Munro persuades his wife and children to give up their Hawaiian vacation for some 'family bonding' on a cross-country RV trip. Family adventure starring Robin Williams

programme.title: Akeelah And The Bee
programme.desc: A young girl has a talent for spelling, which leads her all the way to the National Spelling Bee, despite objections from her mother. Drama starring Laurence Fishburne and Angela Bassett

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: A young man named Tristan tries to win the heart of the beautiful Victoria by venturing into the magical realm to retrieve a fallen star. Adventure starring Michelle Pfeiffer

programme.title: Blue Crush
programme.desc: Hip romantic drama starring Kate Bosworth and Michelle Rodriguez. A surf chick's preparations for a big competition are disrupted by love when she falls for a football player (Matthew Davis)

programme.title: Transporter 2
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Jason Statham, Amber Valletta, Kate Nauta. Mercenary Frank Martin, who specialises in moving goods of all kinds, surfaces again this time in Miami where he's implicated in the kidnapping of the young son of a powerful U.S. politician

programme.title: Deadly Expose
programme.desc: Thriller. When several carnal murders in a small beach town are linked to the public release of a discreet dating app's client information, detective Maxine Payton suspects the killer may be someone intimately close to her

programme.desc: Action. A group of students become trapped inside a mysterious cave where they discover time passes differently underground than on the surface

programme.title: Killer App
programme.desc: Thriller. A young hacker creates an "antisocial" networking app that matches enemies instead of friends - but when her enemies start turning up dead, she must uncover who or what is behind the mysterious deaths before it's too late

programme.title: Skeleton Key
programme.desc: A nurse takes a job as a live-in nurse at a run-down mansion, she begins to explore the house using a skeleton key that unlocks every door and uncovers a terrible secret in the attic. Kate Hudson and John Hurt star

programme.title: The Girl Is In Trouble
programme.desc: Action Thriller starring Columbus Short and Wilmer Valderrama. A Lower East Side bartender becomes entangled in a murder mystery involving a desperate woman, a missing drug dealer and the scion of a powerful investment firm

programme.title: Rh+ The Vampire Of Seville
programme.desc: Animated comedy. A family of vampires returning to Spain get separated far from home. The head of the family ends up in New York and helps an alien save the Statue of Liberty from evildoers

programme.title: Rainbow Valley Heroes
programme.desc: Take a magical animated journey far beyond the clouds to the end of the rainbow, to an enchanted place called Rainbow Valley. Imagine a world of colourful fun, where a fleet of fun-loving rescue trucks live and play

programme.title: Zodiac: The Race Begins

programme.desc: Teo, an ET boy being groomed to succeed his grandfather, the emperor of planet Suaracia, would rather have fun hunting. The emperor's evil advisor wishes to rule and will do anything to help Teo lose his birthright

programme.title: Destined To Ride
programme.desc: Family adventure starring Denise Richards and Joey Lawrence. Lily's life is turned upside down when she is forced to leave her friends to spend the summer on a remote ranch. where she meest an unlikely group of friends and embarks on an adventure of a lifetime

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: Action. When the world's tallest and safest building catches on fire, Will Sawyer (Dwayne Johnson), a former FBI agent, gets framed for it. Now a wanted man, he must find those responsible, clear his name and somehow rescue his family trapped inside the inferno

programme.title: Savannah Sunrise
programme.desc: Drama and comedy. Joy and her family fly to help her mother-in-law moving from her home in Louisville, to a retirement community in Savannah, But after a mixed-up flight reservation, a straightforward road trip turns into a hilarious journey of a lifetime

programme.title: Game Day
programme.desc: Drama. A basketball-savvy teen reluctantly agrees to coach a brilliant but self-centered tech whiz who has lost everything when her startup goes bust and personal life is left in ruins

programme.title: Ferdinand
programme.desc: Animation. After Ferdinand, a bull with a big heart, is mistaken for a dangerous beast, he is captured and torn from his home. Determined to return to his family, he rallies a misfit team on the ultimate adventure

programme.title: Faith, Love And Chocolate
programme.desc: Comedy. Jessica Miller (Sydney Bullock) is thrust into the real world when she graduates from college. To conquer this new world, she must discover her faith, open a box of memories and learn the simple secrets of life only a mother can share

programme.desc: Romance. Charlotte struggles to balance her upcoming wedding with her career. She searches for answers in her hometown, where she runs into her high school sweetheart, which prompts Charlotte to wonder what life would have been like if she'd never left

programme.desc: Action and adventure starring Alicia Vikander and Dominic West. Lara Croft, the fiercely independent daughter of a missing adventurer, must push herself beyond her limits when she discovers the island where her father disappeared

programme.title: Isle Of Dogs
programme.desc: Animation and adventure. Set in Japan, Isle of Dogs follows a boy's odyssey in search of his lost dog

programme.title: A Boy Called Po
programme.desc: Drama. After his wife's death, an overworked engineer struggles to care for his son with autism, who regresses into a fantasy world to escape real-life bullying

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Animated adventures. Peter Rabbit's feud with Mr. McGregor escalates to greater heights than ever before as they rival for the affections of the warm-hearted animal lover who lives next door

programme.title: Sense And Sensibility
programme.desc: Comedy drama starring Emma Thompson, Alan Rickman, Kate Winslet, Hugh Grant. In this adaptation of Jane Austen's classic novel, the ability of two sisters to make a suitable match is hindered by their father's sudden death and subsequent loss of the family fortune

programme.title: Flight
programme.desc: Drama. Denzel Washington stars as an airline pilot who crash-lands his plane after a mid-air catastrophe, saving nearly every soul on board. After the crash he's hailed a hero, but as more is learned, more questions than answers arise as to who or what was at fault

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: Unless a comet can be destroyed before colliding with Earth, only those allowed into shelters will survive. Which people will survive? Thriller with Morgan Freeman, Tea Leoni and Elijah Wood

programme.title: Heartlands
programme.desc: Comedy drama, Michael Sheen, Mark Addy, Jim Carter. Colin is a simple man who is stunned to learn that his wife has taken up with the captain of his dart team. Upon learning the two are headed to a big dart competition in Blackpool, Colin hops on his moped in pursuit

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards
programme.desc: Oz needs money to divorce his wife; she wants him dead to claim the insurance. When a fugitive gangster moves in next door they both spy a chance to achieve their ambitions. Comedy with Bruce Willis and Matthew Perry

programme.title: Behaving Badly
programme.desc: Comedy. Virginal teen Rick (Nat Wolff) contends with a ravenous MILF, a drug-addicted boss, a taciturn priest, a sexy patron saint, mobsters, and his own suicidal mother in his quest to win the heart of the most beautiful student (Selena Gomez) in school

programme.title: Two For The Money
programme.desc: After suffering a career-ending injury, a former college football star finds himself recruited by one of the most well-known bookies in the sports-gambling business. Drama starring Al Pacino and Matthew McConaughey

programme.title: Order Of Chaos
programme.desc: Psychological thriller starring Rhys Coiro. The borders between right and wrong begin to blur when an honest lawyer with a promising future grows paranoid that those around him are attempting to sabotage his career

programme.title: Li A‘la Se‘r

programme.title: Ayyoub
programme.desc: Mustafa Shaaban; Mirhan Hussein. Eps 14; A drama series about young man recruited in bank. A plot is set and he goes to prison, what changes his view in life. After prison, his plans are revenge. (R3)

programme.title: Halaawat Al Dunia
programme.desc: Hind Sabri; Zafer `Abidin. Eps 13; Amina goes into a conflict when she discovers and fights cancer just before getting. married. (R3)

programme.desc: Abbas Al-Nouri. Eps 13; In the process of resurrecting the Ottoman Empire that was accompanied by rebellions, the strain impacted Damascenes as they were forced to fight a war that wasn`t theirs. (R3)

programme.title: Hatha Al Masaa'
programme.desc: Iyaad Nassar;Arwa Jawdat. Eps 13; The series talks about many social issues with lots of developments to turn small events into big problems. (R3)

programme.title: Something The Lord Made
programme.desc: Biopic bringing to life the story of two medical pioneers (Alan Rickman, Mos Def). While they work side by side, they do not walk the same paths in society, and one develops deep resentment that he's been given little credit for his contribution to a medical innovation

programme.title: On Freddie Roach
programme.desc: Series chronicling the daily activities of celebrated boxing trainer & International Hall of Fame inductee Freddie Roach as he works with elite fighters at his Wild Card Boxing Club, Hollywood, CA, all while fighting an ailment very likely linked to his own boxing past

programme.title: Fahrenheit 451
programme.desc: Sci-fi drama. In a dystopian future where books are banned and ordered to be burned, a so-called fireman (Michael B. Jordan) goes about his work without questioning motives. All this changes when he meets a young girl who makes him challenge his actions and convictions

programme.title: The Gathering Storm
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Albert Finney, Vanessa Redgrave and Jim Broadbent, based on Winston Churchill's memoirs about his life leading up to World War II

programme.title: Six By Sondheim
programme.desc: Documentary. An intimate look at the life and art of legendary composer-lyricist Stephen Sondheim, the man who has redefined musical theatre over the course of a six-decade career through such ground-breaking works as "Sweeney Todd" and "Sunday in the Park with George"

programme.title: Paycheck To Paycheck: The Life & Times Of Katrina
programme.desc: Documentary. The story of a year in the life of one mother whose daily struggles illuminate the challenges faced by more than 42 million American women, constantly getting knocked back by a system that almost seems designed to see her fail

programme.title: Buena Vista Social Club: Adios
programme.desc: Documentary. Twenty years after their first session, members of the Cuban-music supergroup the Buena Vista Social Club discuss how their breakout success altered their lives

programme.title: It Will Be Chaos
programme.desc: An epic, yet intimate portrait of lives in transit and the human consequences of the refugee crisis spanning the Mediterranean, focusing on two unforgettable refugee stories of human strength and resilience in search of a better and safer future

programme.title: I Am Bolt
programme.desc: Documentary on the career and legacy of hugely charismatic and globally adored Jamaican runner Usain Bolt – officially the fastest man alive

programme.title: Blitzed: Nazis On Drugs
programme.desc: The Nazis proclaimed to be warriors against moral degeneracy and yet the Third Reich was permeated with drugs, also crucial to troops' resilience. While drugs cannot on their own explain the events or outcome of WWII, this film shows they change our understanding of it

programme.title: Great Decisions
programme.desc: The US has thrived on its vibrant and free press since the Founding Fathers first put the concept into law in the Bill of Rights. Now Foreign policy is tweeted from the White House and "fake news" has entered the zeitgeist. What's next for media and the free press?

programme.title: Great Decisions
programme.desc: Once seen as a model of democracy, Turkey may be slipping toward autocracy. Critics charge that President Recip Tayyip Erdogan used a failed coup d'etat in 2016 as a means of consolidating power. Great Decisions examines the relationship with this key U.S. ally

programme.title: Americans In Bed
programme.desc: Documentary. In a country with the third-highest rate of divorce in the world, what makes or breaks a relationship in the USA today? From the privacy of their own bedrooms, ten couples offer frank, funny and often surprising insights into love, sex and marriage

programme.title: Americans In Bed
programme.desc: Documentary. In a country with the third-highest rate of divorce in the world, what makes or breaks a relationship in the USA today? From the privacy of their own bedrooms, ten couples offer frank, funny and often surprising insights into love, sex and marriage

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: The acclaimed series returns for a sixth season, providing the Emmy-winning comedian/actor/writer John Oliver a unique platform to offer up his deeply funny and profoundly necessary perspective on any number of social, political or existential issues

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: A prominent family meets their new neighbours in the only Departure-free town in America - Jarden, Texas, renamed "Miracle" after it was discovered no one departed - and experience a mysterious event that will forever change their lives

programme.title: Tell Me You Love Me
programme.desc: May gets devastating news, but decides not to cancel her therapy sessions. Jamie and Hugo reconnect, for better or for worse. Palek's blunt revelation at May's office shocks Carolyn. Having faced the crossroads and challenges, Dave and Katie finally make a breakthrough

programme.title: Lewis Black: Red, White & Screwed
programme.desc: Black stars in an all-new hour of comedy and commentary taped live in Washington, D.C. As one of America's most irreverent and political humourists, he has performed his hyperactive comedy routines throughout Europe and the U.S

programme.title: Ambushed
programme.desc: Action thriller, Courtney B. Vance, Jeremy Lelliott. A cop and his partner look into the suspicious death of a Ku Klux Klan leader. The dead man's son was the only witness. When his partner is also killed, fearing unjust retribution the cop and the Klansman's son flee

programme.title: Barbarians At The Gate
programme.desc: Comedy drama recounting the true-life story of a corporate takeover in the greed-driven 1980s. When Ross Johnson (James Garner), CEO of R.J. R. Nabisco decides to buy out the Nabisco shareholders and take over his company, no one is prepared for what hits the fan

programme.title: Nightingale
programme.desc: Drama. A brutal deed has just taken place. A man (David Oyelowo) undone by mental illness addresses the followers of his video log about his obsession with an old buddy. He speaks of the good times and of love, but the layers of self-deception and posturing are myriad

programme.title: Blitzed: Nazis On Drugs
programme.desc: The Nazis proclaimed to be warriors against moral degeneracy and yet the Third Reich was permeated with drugs, also crucial to troops' resilience. While drugs cannot on their own explain the events or outcome of WWII, this film shows they change our understanding of it

programme.title: Taking Chance
programme.desc: Docudrama inspired by the true story of a US Marine (Kevin Bacon) who offered to escort the remains of a 19-year-old soldier killed in Iraq to his hometown in Wyoming, making it his personal mission to ensure his fallen brother is laid to rest with the proper respect

programme.title: Into The Storm
programme.desc: Drama. Churchill (Brendan Gleeson) rises to the call and becomes a national hero, disregarding the effects his actions have on both his political career and his marriage to Clemmie (Janet McTeer) in a single-minded effort to defeat one of history's greatest tyrants

programme.title: Superheroes
programme.desc: A look inside the zany world of Real Life Superheroes: men and women who have superhero alter-egos. This documentary delves into what inspires them to patrol city streets with the goal of deterring violent crime and, if necessary, taking the law into their own hands

programme.title: Spielberg
programme.desc: Through exclusive interviews with actors, family, and the filmmaker himself, this unprecedented documentary pulls back the curtain on the remarkable career of Steven Spielberg

programme.title: An Inconvenient Sequel: Truth To Power
programme.desc: This sequel to the Oscar-winning documentary, An Inconvenient Truth (2006) follows former Vice President Al Gore, in moments both funny and poignant, as he travels the world to combat climate change, also detailing his efforts at the UN's 2015 Climate Change Conference

programme.title: White Light/Black Rain
programme.desc: Through the powerful recollections of the survivors of the atomic bombs that levelled Hiroshima and Nagasaki in 1945, this documentary presents a deeply moving look at the painful legacy of the first - and hopefully last - uses of thermonuclear weapons in war

programme.title: The Boy Inside: Trapped By The Tourettes
programme.desc: A documentary which follows an extraordinary year in the life of a teenager with one of the worst cases of Tourettes in America. Zack Lamb's twitches and the strange sounds he makes are uncontrollable – and they are getting worse

programme.title: Future Human AI
programme.desc: Artificial intelligence has the potential to change our lives in numerous, unimaginable ways. This enlightening series explores ground-breaking developments and seeks to answer questions about the kind of existence A.I. might be forging for us and future generations

programme.title: Great Decisions
programme.desc: The global power balance is rapidly evolving, leaving the U.S. at a turning point with respect to its level of engagement and the role of its military. How does the military function in today's international order and what role should diplomacy play in defence strategy?

programme.title: Great Decisions
programme.desc: For decades, the U.S. has been a leader in promoting global health, but foreign assistance has fallen out of favour in some circles in Washington, arguing the U.S. should help America first. Is the golden age of global health coming to an end, or just getting started?

programme.title: Riverdale
programme.desc: Betty takes matters into her own hands when she learns that The Farm has set their sights on someone in her inner circle. Meanwhile, Veronica sets a plan in motion to turn the tables on Hiram and Gladys. Elsewhere, Archie grows concerned about a young runaway

programme.title: The Americans
programme.desc: With the arms control summit under way, a shocking revelation from Philip throws Elizabeth - and her work - into turmoil. Elsewhere, Stan follows a dangerous hunch

programme.title: The Voice
programme.desc: Hopeful vocal artists from across the country audition for a chance to be picked to compete on the teams of four musical superstar coaches during the Blind Auditions phase of competition

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: In part one of the season finale, a young woman takes a man hostage at gunpoint and Benson makes a dangerous move to diffuse the situation. The SVU then discovers the shocking motive behind the abduction

programme.desc: In a flash-forward to 2187, Reece finds Leah, an orphaned Common baby, and goes against her Apex cohorts to take her in as her own. In present day, Jude, hoping for a peaceful solution with the Feds, is blindsided by a black-ops team's intent on capturing Reece

programme.desc: Romance is in the air when Mara must track down an elderly woman attempting to relive her lost love, but as Mara dives deeper into her Reverie she realises she may have a greater mission on her mind

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: After a manned mission to Mars faces a deadly storm, they leave behind astronaut Mark Watney, assuming he is dead, and head back to Earth. programme.title: World War Z
programme.desc: United Nations employee, Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt), must leave his family and traverse the world in a race against time to stop a Zombie pandemic that is crumbling armies and governments in its wake

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: A suit-wearing, briefcase-carrying baby teams up with his seven-year old brother to put a stop to the wicked plot of the CEO of Puppy Co

programme.title: Source Code
programme.desc: A soldier wakes up in the body of an unknown man; he discovers that he is part of a mission to find the bomber of a Chicago commuter train

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: After a manned mission to Mars faces a deadly storm, they leave behind astronaut Mark Watney, assuming he is dead, and head back to Earth. Watney finds himself stranded and alone, with limited supplies left, and the will to attempt to signal Earth while knowing that he stands a very little chance of getting rescued

programme.title: A Monster Calls
programme.desc: Connor struggles at school with bullies, and pity looks from everyone, and at home with his mother's sickness. He starts fighting his feelings of guilt and anger, and facing those who bully him at school but his biggest problem is his inability to tell the truth and to acknowledge problems. So Connor seeks the help of a tree monster to overcome his problems

programme.title: Percy Jackson: The Lightning Thief
programme.desc: This picture is a fantasy film directed by Chris Columbus. There is chaos among the ranks of the Greek Pantheon. Someone has stolen Zeus’ lightning bolt but the thief is yet to be found. Zeus declares an ultimatum: if the bolt is not returned to him by the midnight hour of the summer solsitice, war will begin between the members of the Pantheon. Percy Jackson (Logan Lerman), an unassuming adolescent boy, becomes unintentionally involved in a struggle amongst the deities of Ancient Greek myth

programme.title: Red Dawn
programme.desc: A group of teenagers joins forces to defend their small town from invading North Korean soldiers in a remake of the 1984 film about a similar Soviet invasion

programme.title: Wild Card
programme.desc: Nick Wild is a Las Vegas bodyguard with lethal professional skills and a personal gambling problem. When a friend is beaten by a sadistic thug, Nick strikes back, only to find out the thug is the son of a powerful mob boss. Suddenly Nick is plunged into the criminal underworld, chased by enforcers and wanted by the mob. Having raised the stakes, Nick has one last play to change his fortunes...and this time, it's all or nothing

programme.title: Big Game
programme.desc: When Air Force One is shot down by terrorists leaving the President of the United States stranded in the wilderness, there is only one person around who can save him - a 13-year old boy called Oskari, who happens to be in the same place where the president landed in an escape pod

programme.title: Draft Day
programme.desc: The General Manager of the Cleveland Browns struggles to acquire the number one draft pick for his team

programme.title: The Basketball Diaries
programme.desc: This film is based on the true story of a New York teenager Jim Carrol (Leonardo DiCaprio), who dreams of becoming a basketball star. Despite his promising talent, Jim’s life begins to spiral out of control when he gets involved with a street gang and starts using drugs. When he loses a friend to cancer, his life falls further into an abyss and his friendship with Reggie becomes his only hope for escaping a life of addiction and crime

programme.title: Draft Day
programme.desc: The General Manager of the Cleveland Browns struggles to acquire the number one draft pick for his team

programme.title: The Longest Ride
programme.desc: A star-crossed love affair between Luke, a former champion bull rider looking to make a comeback, and Sophia, a college student who is about to embark upon her dream job in New York City's art world. As conflicting paths and ideals test their relationship, Sophia and Luke make an unexpected and fateful connection with Ira, whose memories of his own decades-long romance with his beloved wife deeply inspire the young couple

programme.title: Letters to Juliet
programme.desc: This title is a romantic comedy that was directed by Gary Winick. The film stars Amanda Seyfried, Gael Garcia Bernal and Chris Egan among other talents and was released in theaters in North America on May 14th, 2010. Sophie Hall (Amanda Seyfried) has an unglamorous job working as a fact checker for “The New Yorker” magazine. Her fiancé, Victor (Gael Garcia Bernal), is about to open an Italian restaurant in New York. The couple agree to go on a trip to Italy as a sort of “pre-honeymoon” celebration. However upon arriving at Italy, and much to Sophie’s dismay, Victor seems to be more concerned with finding genuine Italian ingredients for use in his restaurant’s kitchen than he is with spending time with his fiancé. While wandering around town on her own, Sophie finds the house were Juliet Capulet is supposed to have lived in. As part of a local tradition, people gather at that spot to write letters to Juliet which they then post on the house’s walls. Sophie decides to stay after closing hours in order to see what happens to the letters. Thus, she learns that an old woman comes around to collect the letters that are intended for Juliet. She follows the woman and learns that she is one of “Juliet’s secretaries” who seem to have assigned themselves the job of replying to the letters posted to Juliet about amorous concerns. Sophie joins the women and soon discovers a letter that was written in 1957 by an Englishwoman named Claire. As often happens with love stories, Sophie’s life becomes intertwined with that of Claire as the two unexpectedly find themselves together in an adventure to find their true partners. Despite the fact that all they have to go on is a name, Sophie and Claire endeavor to find Claire’s long-lost lover. In the process, Sophie learns more about herself and what she wants than she had previously bargained for

programme.title: The Longest Ride
programme.desc: A star-crossed love affair between Luke, a former champion bull rider looking to make a comeback, and Sophia, a college student who is about to embark upon her dream job in New York City's art world. As conflicting paths and ideals test their relationship, Sophia and Luke make an unexpected and fateful connection with Ira, whose memories of his own decades-long romance with his beloved wife deeply inspire the young couple

programme.title: Remember Me
programme.desc: The tragedy of his brother’s suicide has destroyed the unity of Tyler’s family. His parents have separated and Tyler is now alienated from his father. In this bleak context, Tyler, the young rebellious New Yorker meets a beautiful girl who would bring happiness and harmony back into his life. Elle’s good-looks and “carpe diem” philosophy enchant Tyler and he falls in love with her. Gradually, Tyler feels that his life has meaning once more and she teaches him how to live life in earnest and with gratitude for all the tiny, lovely details that surround them. However, this air of serenity is short lived and ugly secrets that were long hidden start to resurface and to threaten the new relationship. These threats help Tyler learn that real love is a precious thing that deserves to be fought for at any price, even death. This picture is packed with joy and romance, not to mention its fair share of tribulation. It relates a love story that should serve as a reminder for all of us of the importance of living our lives with optimism, hope and faith in all that is good

programme.title: Pearl Harbor
programme.desc: The film follows the love lives of two childhood friends who become Air Force Pilots, and are split when one volunteers to fight in Britain, and the other, along with his friend's lover, is transferred to Pearl Harbor, shortly before the Japanese attack on the place

programme.desc: 2 friends who are relatively new in the crime field kidnap a pizza delivery man and tie him up with explosions in an attempt to make a bank robbery

programme.title: A Family Man
programme.desc: After Ed Blackridge, boss of a Chicago-based headhunter, and Dane Jensen, who works at a recruiting agency arranging jobs for engineers, retire, Jensen finally achieves his long-life goal of taking over the company after going head-to-head with his ambitious rival, Lynn Vogel

programme.title: Danny Collins
programme.desc: Aging rock star Danny Collins is still living on the edge at the age of 70, unable to organize his chaotic life. But when his agent discovers a recorded letter sent to him 40 years ago from John Lennon, Danny decides to amend his life and re-discover his purpose

programme.title: Analyze This
programme.desc: A comedy about a psychiatrist with family issues and his number one patient: a troubled mafioso who suffers from sudden anxiety attacks and does not have the ability to kill. Their lives intersect and a series of comic situations unfold

programme.title: Arrival
programme.desc: A linguist, Louise Banks, and a theoretical physicist, Ian Donnelly are asked by US Army Colonel Weber to join a team to find out why twelve extraterrestrial spacecrafts have appeared across the Earth. Banks makes contact with two seven-limped aliens and starts to learn their language of complicated circular symbols. As mankind swings on the verge of global war, Banks and the team race against time for answers which if misinterpreted, could threaten the future of humanity
